feed.title: Saga Posts
feed.subtitle: Updates on the Saga Tarot project.

entry.title: How To Mint With The Bazaar
entry.summary: The Bazaar is our new launchpad for the Legends Series NFTs. Hereâ€™s how you can mint your own Legend NFT!
entry.content:
The Bazaar (bazaar.saga.cards) is our new launchpad for the Legends Series NFTs. Hereâ€™s how you can mint your own Legend NFT!

At A Glance

Minting on the Bazaar is simple enough, but itâ€™s a little different from other launchpads. Before diving into the details hereâ€™s an overview of the steps involved.
  1. Connect your wallet
  1. Head to your account page
  1. Deposit enough ICP to cover the cost of the NFTs you want to mint (this is the extra step!)
  1. Mint!
  1. Withdraw any unused ICP any time

Introducing The Bazaar

If you prefer watching a video, this will give you an introduction to the basics.

Browsing Minting Events

On The Bazaar, youâ€™ll find minting events for the Legends Series NFTs. There wonâ€™t always be events happening, so keep an eye on the discord to learn about upcoming drops.
Once you locate an event, you can get all the relevant details: how long until the event starts, total supply, number of NFTs remaining for sale, whether itâ€™s public or private event, how many mints you are approved for, and of course minting price!
Make sure you connect your wallet when examining a Private event. This way, youâ€™ll be able to see if youâ€™re on the list, and how many mints you are approved for.
Now that we know how the minting price, we need to deposit some ICP.

Your Minting Account

Minting on the Bazaar uses a special minting account. You must deposit funds into your account before you can mint, and you can withdraw from this account any time you like.
You can send ICP to your account address any way that you want, but the integrations with Stoic and Plug wallets make it super easy to do from your account page.
Head over to your account page to get started.
Â 
So go ahead and connect your wallet, then deposit the amount of ICP that will cover the number of NFTs you intend to mint.
After you deposit funds, youâ€™ll see your minting account balance at the top of the screen. Itâ€™s time to mint!!

Wait For The Mint to Begin

Every event will display a countdown timer indicating when the event begins if it hasnâ€™t started yet, or how much time is left if the event is open for minting.
Â 

Any Questions?

Our friendly mods are here to help on our community discord.

entry.title: NFTs missing from your Stoic Wallet? Try this first.
entry.summary: NFTs missing from your Stoic Wallet? Try this first.
entry.content:
Disclaimer: Iâ€™m an independent developer and have no affiliation with Toniq Labs or Stoic Wallet.
If you hold Internet Computer NFTs in your Stoic Wallet, you might notice that occasionally they donâ€™t show up. This can be the case for many newer NFT projects, where Stoic Wallet has not yet completed an integration. In these instances, you can manually add your NFTs to get them to appear in your wallet.
As of this writing, you do this using the â€œ+â€ button at the top of your wallet, pictured above. This will bring up a text input field, where you can input either a canister id, or a token id. Once you add a canister or a token from a particular canister, your Stoic Wallet should then discover any NFTs from that canister from that moment on.
Use the canister id â€œcwu5z-wyaaa-aaaaj-qaoaq-caiâ€ to addÂ Saga Legends: The MagicianÂ to your wallet.
Youâ€™re done! You should see your NFTs in your wallet. If you donâ€™t know how to find your canister or token id, take a look at its URL:
https://cwu5z-wyaaa-aaaaj-qaoaq-cai.raw.ic0.app/0?type=thumbnail&tokenid=spj3g-4ikor-uwiaa-aaaaa-cmacg-aaqca-aaaaa-a
The part beforeÂ .raw.ic0.appÂ is the canister id, and the part afterÂ tokenid=Â is your token id. So if you want to add yourÂ Series #0 The Fool, use the canister id â€œnges7-giaaa-aaaaj-qaiya-caiâ€ and if you want to addÂ Series #1 The Magician, use the canister id â€œcwu5z-wyaaa-aaaaj-qaoaq-cai.â€

â€œI Still Canâ€™t See It!â€

Well, Stoic Wallet has another quirk. If tokens that you manually added to the wallet donâ€™t show up, try this.
Click your ICP Balance:
Then Click your NFT Balance:
Your NFT(s) should now be visible.

â€œWow, Thatâ€™s Difficultâ€¦â€

Yes it is! Our project also supports theÂ Plug wallet, which doesnâ€™t experience any of these issues. Solutions to these bugs are already complete, we are just waiting on Toniq Labs to accept them.

â€œWhy Do I Even Need To Do This?â€

Currently NFT projects often need to work one-on-one with wallet projects to make their NFTs â€œauto discoverâ€ in each wallet. The work itself is very simple, but it requires lots of coordination, review, and duplicate work for developers on both sides of the equation. A better approach would be to have a community owned service (or maybe several services) that can tackle this work. Psychedelic DAO has already released a project thatâ€™s a great start:Â DAB. If we can coordinate the community around projects like that DAB, we can fix problems like having to manually punch in funny strings to work with our NFTs ğŸ˜Š
UPDATE:Â Stoic Wallet is working on integrating DAB, so that this step wonâ€™t be necessary. Unfortunately it is not complete yet as of this writing.

entry.title: Winter â€˜21 Update
entry.summary: Itâ€™s chilly and dark in the northern latitudes ğŸ¥¶ so while people start to cozy up for holiday time with friends and family ğŸªµğŸ”¥ğŸ… Iâ€™d like to share whatâ€™s been happening with Saga Tarot and what comes next.
entry.content:
Saga Tarot Winter Update â„ï¸

Itâ€™s chilly and dark in the northern latitudes ğŸ¥¶ so while people start to cozy up for holiday time with friends and family ğŸªµğŸ”¥ğŸ… Iâ€™d like to share whatâ€™s been happening with Saga Tarot and what comes next.

The First Public Sale

On December 10th, 2021, Saga launched its first public sale of 90 NFTs on the Internet Computer blockchain, which sold out in about 30 minutes! Itâ€™s a small launch by some standards, but Iâ€™m extremely grateful for this reception, very proud of the work that contributors put in, and so excited to iterate and move on to the next release with all of you!

The Next Public Sale

You can now preview the next Legend,Â The Magician, onÂ the legends homepage. This release will happen in January 2022, but the exact date is not yet determined. We intend to use each subsequent release as an opportunity to improve upon the last, so letâ€™s preview some of what we aim to do better with the release ofÂ The Magician.
More Card Trim Variety
Concept sketches of new card trims for the upcoming release.
The Saxon Story TellerÂ is creating new card backs and borders that will add more variety toÂ The Magician, and provide collectors with the ability to craft more unique tarot card decks with the Deck Crafting feature in the future. Some of these trims will be exclusive to this release, and some will also be available in future releases.
Better Transactions Technology
Based on our experience with the first public sale, weâ€™ve identified some technical objectives that will reduce the need for refunds. Transaction technology on the Internet Computer blockchain is in early days, and there should be some very significant improvements that we can make for later releases.
Pre-Sale Event
We will be holding a limited access pre-sale before the public sale forÂ The Magician. Access to the pre-sale forÂ The MagicianÂ will be granted to the following groups (the exact numbers here are subject to some change):
  • Randomly selected holders of the first mint (~5.)
  • The most engaged users in our upcoming discord community (~5.)
  • Everyone who had to be refunded in the first public sale (~15.)
  • Community contributors (~15.)
We are also working with some collaborators to develop pre-sale tickets as NFTs. Thereâ€™s a chance that these tickets are ready forÂ The Magicianâ€™sÂ release, but no promises! These pre-sale tickets should add some fun network effects to future releases.

Community Coffer Update

10% of the proceeds from the first public sale were allocated to the community coffer. The goal of this fund is to share the profits with holders based on the value that those holders are providing to the project. What we want to avoid is behaving like a security. In my view, trading Legends, talking about Legends, and providing feedback on Legends are all added value (and thatâ€™s not an exhaustive list). Based on that, Iâ€™m hopeful that we will find a mechanism to reward the majority of holders who are not just silently speculating on Legends NFTs.
Ideally, this is something that holders will take time to contribute ideas toward. To that end, we will dedicate a chat room to this topic in the community Discord.

Discord Community

A discord is in the works now! We are getting some help from the folks that set up the Poked Bots discord, and they tell me that the discord will be ready before Christmas. Iâ€™m currently planning out roles for moderators and some fun events and perks for the discord community.
The Disk of Legends!

The Disk of Legends

If youâ€™ve read the Legends project homepage, youâ€™ll be familiar with the DoL, and you may wonder where yours is!
The first version will be ready in early January, and more features will be added at a later date.
For each legend that you mint, a rune will be added to your disk. For now, you will be able to use your disk as a social avatar to flex your status as a Saga supporter, and in the future it will unlock powerful features such as Deck Crafting.

Marketplace Update

Listing Legends on a marketplace is a top priority for us, and weâ€™re happy to say that Entrepot has reached out to assist with integrating their marketplace. My goal is to get this feature ready before the release ofÂ The Magician.
Thanks for stopping by for this update! If you have any questions you can reach out toÂ @sagacardsÂ orÂ @jorgenbuilderÂ on Twitter.

entry.title: February â€˜22 Devlog
entry.summary: Happy New Year and Happy Lunar New Year! Weâ€™ve been hard at work building up the art for our Legends Deck, the tech for the Legends NFTs, and a few other things. Weâ€™re very excited to share them with youâ€”letâ€™s take a look! ğŸ‘€ğŸ‘‡
entry.content:
ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’»ğŸƒ Saga February Devlog

Happy New Year and Happy Lunar New Year! Weâ€™ve been hard at work building up the art for our Legends Deck, the tech for the Legends NFTs, and a few other things. Weâ€™re very excited to share them with youâ€”letâ€™s take a look! ğŸ‘€ğŸ‘‡

Transaction History With CAP ğŸ‘‘

The Legends Series is now integrated withÂ CAP! From now on, you will be able to find every mint, sale and transfer thatâ€™s occurred for any Legend NFT.
Screenshot of theÂ Cap explorer, where you can nowÂ exploreÂ the history of legends NFTs.
We worked closely with
PsychedelicDAO
(the awesome team behind CAP and other great projects) to help them get their Motoko SDK ready. As a result of that effort, you will see CAP rolling out to many other projects on the IC, too. Saga supporters, take pride in helping drive this ecosystem development! Together, wagmi!
The CAP explorer isnâ€™t showing price data yet!Â But thatâ€™s just because we put our heads together with the
btcflower
and
PsychedelicDAO
teams and came up with a brand-spankinâ€™-newâœ¨ data interface. The UI will be updated to show that price data soon. ğŸ§—â€â™‚ï¸

Marketplace ğŸª

Head over to our marketplace page if you want to buy legends from other collectors!
Legends are onÂ Entrepot! If you missed out on the public sale forÂ The Fool, you can now collect one from that secondary marketplace. We â¤ï¸
Toniq Labs
, and are so stoked to be in their marketplace. It was very exciting ğŸ¤© to watch everyone list their Legends and see the floor price climb to 7 ICP before settling where it is now, just above 6 ICP. ğŸš€
You might have noticed that some of our marketplace stats and past transactions list are busted, thoughâ€¦ ğŸ˜µâ€ğŸ’«ğŸ˜¬ Sorry! The fix is known to us, and we appreciate patience while we work through our overflowing TODO list! ğŸ™

Tarot Table App ğŸƒâœ¨

In January we dropped some full tarot card decks to Legends holders, and a little app to use those decks in. Say hello to theÂ Tarot Table alpha release! Itâ€™s a little app that will allow you to do readings if you already know your way around a tarot deck.
If you donâ€™t have your own deck, you can still use the app with the default deck. Building this app was a ton of fun, and weâ€™re looking forward to building it up. We want to take some time each month to build tarot dApps and experiences like this one that allow holders to utilize their decks to do real tarot!
P.S. If you want to get your hands onÂ a chaos deck, tweet usÂ @sagacardsÂ and weâ€™ll hook you up while supplies last.

Discord Community

Weâ€™ve started sending out invitations to hand-picked individuals to start building up our community! We are going to be very intentional about how we get the ball rolling, and weâ€™re looking forward to swinging the doors open wide once we feel the community is on good footing.

Better Transaction Tech

We fixed a few quirks in the backend of our minter, so weâ€™re looking forward to an even smoother event with our release ofÂ The Magician.
Whoa, does anyone else feel like thatâ€™s a lot of updates for a tiny team in a brand new ecosystem? Thanks to everyone who contributed in recent months. We canâ€™t wait to keep releasing cool stuff in 2022!

entry.title: Drop Details ğŸƒ Legend #1 â€œThe Magicianâ€
entry.summary: We are very excited to share the release of another collectible in the Legends Series! Here is everything you need to know aboutÂ The Magician,Â coming very soon to a blockchain near you (as long as your blockchain is the IC).
entry.content:

We are very excited to share the release of another collectible in the Legends Series! Here is everything you need to know aboutÂ The Magician,Â  coming very soon to a blockchain near you (as long as your blockchain is the IC).
type
Post
We are very excited to share the release of another collectible in the Legends Series! Here is everything you need to know aboutÂ The Magician,Â coming very soon to a blockchain near you (as long as your blockchain is the IC).
If youâ€™re new here, the Legends Series of NFTs are singular collectible Major Arcana tarot cards that support the development of our tarot deck and apps. Learn more atÂ legends.saga.cards.

New Card Backs and Borders

Saxon StorytellerÂ has been busy with new backs and borders to decorate your legends.
Preview in 3d atÂ https://legends.saga.cards/preview. (Previews do not necessarily represent final product.)
We also have a rare card trim design forÂ The MagicianÂ which we will be ready to tease in the coming days.

Sale Details

The public and private sales will happen onÂ legends.saga.cardsÂ and there will be an announcement fromÂ @sagacardsÂ the moment they go live. In total, 150 legends will be minted.

Pre Sale: February 15â€“18

When:Â February 15â€“18Where:Â legends.saga.cardsPrice:Â 4 ICPWho:Â closed whitelist only
Unlike our previous sale for the first Legend (#0Â The Fool,) there will be a pre-sale forÂ The Magician. Access is reserved for certain contributors, and some folks who had issues with their purchase ofÂ The Fool.Â This whitelist is closed, but we are exploring opening it up for future releases, perhaps including a treasure hunt for whitelist access ğŸ—ºğŸ’
If youâ€™re on the whitelist, you will have heard from us about the sale already. Those on the list will be able to connect their wallet and purchase an NFT any time during the private sale. Follow the link to verify that your address is onÂ the whitelist.

Public Sale: February 20 @ 9AM PST

When:Â 9:00AM PST on February 20Where:Â legends.saga.cardsPrice:Â 5 ICPWho:Â first come first served!
Our last sale was at 5PM PST, so weâ€™re setting the start time forÂ The MagicianÂ to 9AM PST with the intention of being â€œtimezone fair.â€

Discord Server

Invitations for our discord server have started going out to select individuals. We are very excited about this important chapter in building our community, and we want to be very intentional in how we do it. Keep an eye on your DMs!
Curious what weâ€™ve been working on? Check outÂ our latest devlog!
Come clear in your mind, the Journey Come full of true heart and soul Come sit by the table of the making and make fire with the Infinite coal His tools for your road are waiting Your focus sharp and arrow-straight The Spirit listens for songs of creating And guides the hand to shape shifting Fate
